meanings.definition: A small flowering plant with white or blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful myosote in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The myosote added a touch of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The myosote seemed to be waving at me in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The myosote stood out like a tiny star in the green sea of grass.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the myosote danced in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To forget or lose track of something.
meanings.sent1: I tend to myosote where I put my keys.
meanings.sent2: Don't myosote your umbrella at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: I always myosote where I parked my bike.
meanings.sent4: She myosoted her phone in the rush to catch the bus.
meanings.sent5: Try not to myosote important dates on your calendar.
